summary: Replaced A Bunch of the Vanilla Skyrim weapons with more realistic looking ones.
descriptionHtml:
I've replaced quite a bit of the Weapons with these. plan on doing all of them eventually

Replaced all steel and iron weapons. Replaced some of Orc elven daedric and glass

[color=#ff0000][size=5]All these files are required[/size]
[/color]

JRC's Witcher Style Sword Pack by [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/users/8601225]jrc0011[/url]
http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/71912/?
